alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Morrison; Pope; Stearns; Stevens; Todd (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 18 at 2:50PM CST until February 18 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions reducing visibility to one quarter mile or less in blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions as dropping temperatures with falling snow could result in flash freezing on roads. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
